title: For Sale: 1882 Harper's Weekly Woodcut - Providence BB Team w/4 HOF'ers
author: bcbgcbrcb

posts.post_title: For Sale: 1882 Harper's Weekly Woodcut - Providence BB Team w/4 HOF'ers
posts.post_content:
Good Afternoon, Collectors:

Up for sale today is a very nice 1882 Harper's Weekly Woodcut picturing the Providence Grays BB Team including HOF'ers: George Wright, Harry Wright, John Ward & Charles Radbourne. Please review the enlarged scan of this item for condition details. Sale price on this beauty is $50.00 dlvd. and the first person to e-mail me and state "I'll take it" is the new owner. My e-mail address is: [url]vguerrerobb@yahoo.com[/url]

posts.post_title: FINAL PRICE REDUCTION - 1882 Harper's Weekly Woodcut - Providence BB Team w/4 HOF'ers
posts.post_content: BUMP due to final price reduction before returning to my collection.
